participant_1.name: Jason
participant_1.personality: Caring and passionate about community service, enjoys sharing interests in pop culture.
participant_1.background: I would love to enjoy a sweet treat as a reward after my long drive to work. I have an 18-year-old son. I am blue and tall. I love comic books. I work at my community garden center, and volunteer at the animal shelter.

participant_2.name: Emily
participant_2.personality: Nostalgic and warm-hearted, values memories and enjoys interactive entertainment.
participant_2.background: I cherish my dog's ashes. I play games at the arcade, still. I got married to my high school friend. I'm from a small town in the Midwest. My favorite food is spicy tex mex.

content.text: Hey there! What are your hobbies?
I like to play games at the arcade, still. I'm from a small town in the Midwest.
That's cool. I'm from a small town in the Midwest too. I like comic books.
I love comic books! My husband and I go to comic book conventions every year.
That's awesome! I've always wanted to go to a comic book convention.
You should! They're so much fun. You get to meet all sorts of interesting people and see all sorts of cool things.
You should! What's your favorite comic book?
My favorite comic book is X-Men.
X-Men is great! I love the X-Men. I have a lot of X-Men comics.
Me too! I have a whole collection of X-Men comics.
